page.title: 20Ingatestone - Industry.
page.content:
There is little industrial development in the area though there are a few small factories; the largest is that of G.E.C.(Signal) Ltd. in Ingatestone itself and bordering on the railway line. There is a builders yard and in Fryerning Lane Larmar engineering.
This and the previous nineteen pages written by Nigel Horn, Susan Welham and Paul Kavanagh.
Land cover survey and amenity counts carried out by Nigel Horn, Adrian Copley and the lower sixth 'A' level Geography group of Shenfield School.
July 1985
